#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<utility>
#include<string.h>
#include<algorithm>

#define LL long long int
#define s(a) scanf("%d",&a)
#define ss(a) scanf("%s",a)
#define w(t) while(t--)
#define f(i,n) for(i=0;i<n;i++)
#define fd(i,n) for(i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
#define p(a) printf("%d",a)
#define ps(a) printf("%s",a)
#define pc(a) printf("%c",a)
#define ent printf("\n")

using namespace std;

char s[100];

int main()
{
    int x,i,f;
    while(fgets(s, 100, stdin))
    {   f=0;
        x=strlen(s);
        for(i=0;i<x;)
        {
                if(s[i]=='-'&&s[i+1]=='>'&&f==0)
                {
                    printf(".");
                    i++;
                }
                else if(s[i]=='/'&&s[i+1]=='/')
                {
                    f=1;
                    printf("%c",s[i]);
                }
                else
                    printf("%c",s[i]);
                i++;
        }
        //ent;
    }
	return 0;
}
